Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
I like this bright white color. It's like looking at
fresh laundry.

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
I like pink. Sugar and spice and everything nice,
you know?

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
If I walk through these grounds, I look like a
noblewoman, don't I? ...Don't I?

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
This decor makes me feel...kind of strange
somehow.

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
Phew, I'm tired. Maybe I should take a break
here.

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
I love milk. Every time I even look at a milk can, I
can't help but drool... Oops, like that.

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
That wagon brings back a lot of fond
memories...

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
Did I wander into some sort of temple? This
column looks positively holy!

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
Nothing says "summer" like a blue beach
parasol, don't you think?

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
What is this sign trying to tell me...?

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
You know, I really prefer brick roads.
Cobblestone roads just don't have that same
warmth to them.
What a beautiful tree. I like the red lighting.

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
What is this? I've never seen anything like it
before.

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
Oh, it's very...leafy! Someone grew this really
well.

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
I came here to shop, but honestly, there's
nothing to buy.

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
There's not much for sale here, but I found what
I wanted.

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
There's more to buy here than I thought. I guess
I underestimated this place.

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
I could shop here all day! Wow, this town is
great!

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
Hmm? What do you want?

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
I'm trying to run some numbers. Do you mind
being quiet for a minute?

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
This town's very green and rustic. I like it.

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
This town's a lot livelier now. That's a good
thing.

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
Oh my, was this town this busy last time I was
here?

<NAME_MOB_ANITA>
This is the biggest little town in the world! I envy
the people who live here.
